Noun: a commercial document showing that the holder is entitled to something (as to ride on public transportation or to enter a public entertainmen)
a label written or printed on paper, cardboard, or plastic that is attached to something to indicate its owner, nature, price, etc.
a summons issued to an offender (especially to someone who violates a traffic regulatio)
a list of candidates nominated by a political party to run for election to public offices
Verb: issue a ticket or a fine to as a penalty
provide with a ticket for passage or admission
